m_descr: Schedule devices using a table of schedule entries that include checking presence, day of week and time.  Time can be based on sunrise/sunset and times can be randomised.  Entries will be suspended where the end time is before the start time
h_scene: A scene could only be activated.
help_title: Explanation of the columns in the schedule entries
rand_maxAdj: Max amount to randomly adjust time in format HH:MM e.g. 00:10 or 0:10 for ten minutes
help_presence: Presence: Checked against Presence and Vacation devices: Home if Presence=On, Away if Presence=Off and Vacation=Off, Vacation if Presence=Off & Vacation=On
help_random: Random: If Yes then the switches for the entry will have their time randomised if Randomly Move Start or End Time are set
help_days: Days: Select for the days the entry is to apply to - this refers to the Start time e.g. if set to Weekday then can start on Fri and end on Sat
help_start_type: Start Type: Selecting Time uses Start Time directly, Sunrise/Sunset+/-Time adjustment +/- is done using Start Time
help_start_time: Start Time Time to turn on device or call start scene, affected by Start Type and Random
help_end_type: End Type: Selecting Time uses End Time directly, Sunrise/Sunset+/-Time adjustment +/- is done using End Time
help_end_time: End Time Time to turn of device or call end scene, affected by End Type and Random
help_config:
ConfigCan be used for extra configuration. Several formats are supported, all apart from the first can be combined with a space separating them:
  • s1[,s2..] comma separated list of switch name/references. This can match the switch name or the optional reference
  • S:s1[,s2..]
  • Switches:s1,[s2...]
  • D:d1,[d2] The days the entry applies to, if present this overrides the Days column. dn can be one of Su,Mo,Tu,We,Th,Fr & Sa or numbers 0-6, where 0 is Sun and 6 Sat
  • Days:d1,[d2]
help_config_examples:
Config examples:
  • Hall - this entry only affects the switch with name or optional reference of Hall
  • S:Porch D:We - will turn on switch Porch every Wed, will turn it off on Wed or Thu
